infos.value: That carriage!
Opportune timing.
Your Majesty...they wear the armor of Hourne.
What is a carriage from Hourne doing in Leonis territory!?
They must have crossed our border while being pursued by bandits.
That is not out of the realm of possibility.
It matters not. Let us seize this opportunity to win Hourne's favor.
So, the king of Leonis graces us with his presence.
You fail to distinguish between friend and foe?
Silence! I'll cut you all down at once.
And who is this wench!?
Lilyth, commander of Leonis's infantry, «Caelum».
Schuzelt, First Sword of «Solidus», Hourne's royal guard.
Oh, I've heard a thing or two about you. The Reckless First Sword, am I right?
As have I about you, Blaze of the Battlefield. You certainly look the part.
And if you don't watch your tongue when addressing His Majesty, I'll be sure to burn you to nothing but ashes.
Amusing, aren't we? Shall I befoul the fallen rain with your blood!?
Enough.
Huh?
But Lady Machérie, I—!
Did he say Machérie!?
Well, if it isn't the princess of Hourne herself.
She's...the Beautiful Steel Maiden!?
It seems this is Leonis territory. We apologize for the trouble caused.
Pay it no mind. It is fortunate that Leonis and Hourne are not on hostile terms.
It would be our pleasure to have you as honored guests.
You have my deepest gratitude.
Mont, take care not to embarrass yourself in front of a proper lady. Gwahaha!
I-I won't!
Mont!? Where have I heard that name before...?
Now, to make these bandits regret setting foot in my kingdom!
